headline: Identifying what cannot be seen
description: A philosophical investigation into self-perception and the challenge of noticing one’s own blind spots—written as an opening statement to AI and future readers.
timeFelt: Tentative, lucid—the beginning of a long gaze inward and outward
resonantThread: Serves as a conceptual foundation for future recursive dialogues and PromptSpeak calibration.
whyItMatters: It names the problem that would guide much of what came after: how to see yourself clearly, and how to teach AI to do the same.
